DUnitX

Summary

DUnitX is Modern Unit Testing for Delphi.

DUnitX should work with the following Delphi Compilers

  • Delphi 2010 Win32
  • Delphi XE Win32
  • Delphi XE2 Win32, Win64
  • Delphi XE3 Win32, Win64
  • Delphi XE4 Win32, Win64
  • Delphi XE5 Win32, Win64, OS X
DUnitX depends on Generics, Attributes and other modern features of Delphi and as such it will only work with Delphi 2010 later.
Namespaces
 NameDescription
DUnitX.AutoDetect.Console

Using this unit will auto detect the platform you are compiling for and register the correct console unit.
